descriptionHtml:
[color=\"#FF0000\"][b][size=\"5\"]To gain access to Horse Inventory press E while Sneaking[/size][/b][/color]
Please test the version 1.5, and post if it works.

[url=file.php?id=16116]German Version[/url] by powerbenny1706

No more Lydia have to carry your burdens, horse will do! This mod allows you to use inventory of your steed. All you need is to sneak and then activate the horse. So get all your loot and pack it on animal - \"skyrim horses are not fast but sturdy\". Make the hell out of their sturdyness!
But this will look irrelevant when you see that now you can equip your horse with AWESOME [url=file.php?id=13348]Horse Armors for Skyrim by Mystikhybrid[/url]. Just craft the armor at forge and put it in the horse inventory - horse will be equiped with it! Take it from horse and you can ride bareback!

I want to give special thanks to fg109, without his help this mod could not be created.

Now i want to warn you that i am not responsible for any item loss caused by this mod. So dont put important/valuable/unique items on the horse. Not like that was ever happened to me, but its not my fault if your horse will eat your lockpicks.
If you found any bugs feel free to post them in comments, i will try to fix them.

So, this mod adds items that you can give to horses for them to equp:
Saddle
Imperial Saddle
Daedric Horse Armor
Dragonbone Horse Armor
Dwemer Horse Armor
Ebony Horse Armor
Leather Horse Armor
Steel Horse Armor
Black Saddle
All craftable at forge! 
NEW - Now you can buy horse armor from Jervar at Whiterun stables! Dont think it will be cheap tho :)

UPDATE INFO
If you are updating from versions 1.0 or 1.1 to version 1.2 you need to reinitalise the horse. This is pretty easy to do, but before you do that horses will work like ones from 1.1
There is 3 ways to do so. You need to do only one.
1. Enter any city. 
2. Fast trevel somewhere that is far from your current location.
3. If you use something like Open Cities Skyrim and hate fasttrevel then you can open console, click on your horse and type \"disable\" then type \"enable\"

UNINSTALLATION:
1. Take your items from the horse (leave the saddle)
2. Download Uninstall Horse Inventory in optional files, place in your data folder, activate it and deactivate HorseInventory.esp
3.  Enter any major city OR fasttrevel OR activate/deactivate the horse.

Mods that i recommend:
[url=file.php?id=13348]Horse Armors for Skyrim[/url] by Mystikhybrid
[url=file.php?id=14037]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url] by fLokii
[url=file.php?id=15689]Briarheart Geis[/url] by me
author: DarkPhoenixxy

files.name: Horse Inventory 1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Jervar at Whiterun stables now sells horse armor and saddles
Horse armor cost is now matches the cost of the same type cuirass

files.name: Horse Inventory 1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Added \"Black Saddle\" - saddle of Shadowmere
Default saddle now appear in the horse\'s inventory

files.name: Horse Inventory 1_3
files.changelogHtml: Rewrited to be compatible with 1.6 patch
